Hoboken.Cornelia Street Cafe: The Cornelia Street Cafe, is a restaurant & bar on Cornelia Street in New York City's Greenwich Village, United States, opened in July 1977. It was the birthplace of the Monday night songwriter's workshop started by singer/songwriter/and then cafe waitress Carolyne Mas, in December 1977. The group became known as The Songwriter's Exchange, and released an album on Stash Records in 1980.
